metadata.title: CVE-2024-24857 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A race condition was found in the Linux kernel's net/bluetooth devicedriver in conn_info_{min,max}_age_set() function. This can result inintegrity overflow issue, possibly leading to bluetooth connectionabnormality or denial of service.
